__e: And if they don't, they will find... that they are not as far above the law as they think.
No, I don't think so, but that doesn't mean the cops won't figure out that I was there.
Well, you can't leave now, or they're going to know you had something to do with it.
They will find out exactly what caused your husband's death.
My men will find out what he's done with the bodies.
You may like it out here now, but... let's see what happens when they find out what you really are.
